--- title: BreaKHis Classification with GradCAM keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Fine-tuning classification networks and using GradCAM to obtain object detection results on histopathological slides of breast cancer." ---

Install¶

pip install breakhis_gradcam

Later¶

  • Examples of how to use this package
  • Visualizations of results (GradCAM, corresponding object detection) after training using models defined by this package
